name: DownBlade
description:
Exciting falling hero action! DownBlade!

Slay monsters from the underworld! Don't allow them to go through!
And kill the king of the underworld to make a peaceful world!

Game feature
- Simple, but addictive and fun!
- Fast and fancy action!
- There are many kinds of equipment that you can customize!
- Improve items to make strong hero!
- 4 theme world and boss

Thank you for enjoying!
